name: Life of Py
tagline: A python library with ready-to-use utility functions
body:
### Welcome to LifeOfPy (python library) page


### Function Specifications
#### File handling utilities
1. replace(file_path, pattern, subst)
2. change_delimiter(input_file_path, output_file_path, from_delimiter, to_delimiter)
3. remove_folder_contents(folder)
4. singleFile_to_multiFile(original_file, first_file_end_point, write_from, write_till, folder_name)

#### Clustering utilities
1. reduce_data(input_vector, number_of_components)
2. apply_clustering(normalized_fv_filename)
3. plot_clusters_3D(feature_vectors, predicted_clusters)
4. plot_clusters_2D(feature_vectors, predicted_clusters)
5. sort_by_cluster(identifiers_filename)
6. align_points_with_feaure_vectors()
7. find_representative_points()

### Authors and Contributors
started by @rajesh-iiith
Please share your well built functions to make your contribution.

### Contribute to this library
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
